TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to apply an query.
TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Click on Apply Query Button.Capture screenshot.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on apply query button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on apply query button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on apply query button.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify Query has been applied.Capture screenshot.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify that query has been applied.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify that query has been applied.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to verify that query has been applied.
